body_html: On the cpu, accreal type for float32 inputs is double, so in many cases for fp32 inputs intermediate computations will be in double. It indeed may be unexpected and not match numpy behavior, but the differences should be small in most cases.
body_text: On the cpu, accreal type for float32 inputs is double, so in many cases for fp32 inputs intermediate computations will be in double. It indeed may be unexpected and not match numpy behavior, but the differences should be small in most cases.
body: On the cpu, accreal type for float32 inputs is double, so in many cases for fp32 inputs intermediate computations will be in double. It indeed may be unexpected and not match numpy behavior, but the differences should be small in most cases.
